column5: Do any one remember those big pike pictures someone posted I think the fish were caught in the Netherlands I was trying to find those big pictures of those big pike
Not sure but this might be what you are looking for....  OFC Old board post  blyght

I think that the photos were stripped from a Dutch fishing site that is no longer in operation.  I found that the fisherman's name is Ewout Blom, and you can find them by googling 'Ewout Blom pike'.    Here's another link to some more pictures.
